price: 13. Kaadu diggah, nanu qhuraanay massa le gitâ fanah tirri sinam haa noobbe waqdi kaa nummasneh tokkel isi Rabbi nummayse num abite maqaaneh daggoysiyyak ma meesitaay dulmih abe umaanek fulah tu kaat osisaanamak mameesita.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lammā samiʿ'nā al-hudā āmannā bihi faman yu'min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqan
